name: Essence of Time: Bienta's Extension
description:
Bienta isn't the type of student to blow off an assignment. And yet here she is, asking her professor for an extension. Now she's got until sundown to finish her essay. Help her find the inspiration she needs to succeed!

  • This game was made as a part of the inkJam2021, which has the theme: You'll Think Of Something

This game is a spin-off of Essence of Time: First Memories.

Join our Essence of Time Discord: https://discord.com/invite/jbukx6CuGs
